results.name: Expansion of (1-2*x)/((1-x)*(1-x+x^2)).
comment: Row sums of number triangle A100218.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-2,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1 - 2*x)/((1 - x)*(1 - x + x^2)), {x,0,50}], x] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{2,-2,1}, {1,0,-2}, 50] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 13 2017 *)
Table[Cos[Pi*n/3 + Pi/3] + Sqrt[3]*Sin[Pi*n/3 + Pi/3] - 1, {n, 0, 71}] (* _Indranil Ghosh_, Mar 13 2017 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Nov 08 2004
